mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT live.CONF_ID as confId, live.id, CONCAT(live.TITLE, '(',hospital.HOSPITAL_NAME,')',DATE_FORMAT( live.START_TIME,'%Y%m%d') ) as fileuploadname, hospital.BUCKET as bucket, hospital.ID as hospitalId, codec.ID as codecId, file.FILE_NAME as filename FROM FBS_LIVE_PARTICIPANT flp INNER JOIN fbs_live_broadcast live ON live.ID = flp.LIVE_ID INNER JOIN FBS_LIVE_FILE file ON file.CONF_ID = live.CONF_ID LEFT JOIN FBS_HOSPITAL_INFORMATION hospital ON hospital.ID = flp.HOSPITAL_ID LEFT JOIN FBS_LIVE_CODEC codec ON codec.HOSPITAL_ID = hospital.ID and file.HOSPITAL_ID = hospital.ID where flp.ISGENERATED = '1' and live.CONF_ID is not null and hospital.BUCKET is not null and (file.UPLOAD_STATUS is null or file.UPLOAD_STATUS <> '1')
mapper.update:
update FBS_LIVE_FILE set UPLOAD_STATUS = '1' where
(CONF_ID = #{item.confId} and HOSPITAL_ID = #{item.hospitalId} and CODEC_ID = #{item.codecId})
update FBS_LIVE_FILE set STOREFILE_STATUS = '1' where id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM fbs_live_file WHERE HOSPITAL_ID=#{hospitalId} AND CONF_ID=#{confId} AND CODEC_ID=#{codecId} AND OLDFILE_STATUS='0'
